ba:description.p: 21 Júl 2008 (SK) Bratislava.pm.org má news feed.
(EN) just created news feed! to inform about news and events
(SK) Krátky článok o CPAN-e a nástrojoch ktoré ponúka
(EN) Short article about CPAN and it's tools
(SK) Návod ako zostrojiť modul pre CPAN
(EN) How to make CPAN-like module
(SK) teraz je v článku o UTF-8 viac omáčky o tom čo sa deje a pridal som sekciu o PerlIO
(EN) now the article about UTF-8 has more explanations about what's going on and a topic about PerlIO

(SK) 7. a 8. Novembra Bratislava.pm a Vienna.pm organizujú TwinCity Perl Workshop. 7. Novembra sa bude konať vo Viedni a 8. Novembra v Bratislave. Zároveň sme V Bratislave začali hľadať priestory kde by sa dal tento workshop usporiadať. Akýkoľvek tip je vítaný.

(EN) 7. and 8. November Bratislava.pm and Vienna.pm are organizing the TwinCity Perl Workshop. The workshop will be held during two days, the 7th of November it will be hosted in Vienna and the 8th of November in Bratislava (in the Hotel Baronka in Rača).

ba:event.ba:title: TwinCity Perl Workshop call for Participation
ba:event.ba:subject: events
ba:event.ba:creator: jozef

ba:description.p: (SK) TwinCity Perl Workshop už má stránku na ktorej sa dá registrovať aj pridávať návrhy na prednášky - http://conferences.yapceurope.org/tcpw2008/
(EN) The TwinCity Perl Workshop has now a page where you can register and also send the proposal for talks - http://conferences.yapceurope.org/tcpw2008/

ul.li: Emmanuel Rodriguez - D-Bus integration in Perl.
Jonathan Worthington - Object Orientation, The Perl 6 Way.
Michael Kröll - Pimp your CMS using WebDAV and Perl.

ba:description.p: (SK) Vďaka firme Ergon sme mali priestor kde sa stretnúť, vďaka firme VeriSign sme mali data projektor a samozrejme vďaka že si Emmanuel, Jonathan a Michael pripravili prednášky!
(EN) Thanks to Ergon company we had a place to meet, thanks to VeriSign we had a data projektor and thanks to Emmanuel, Jonathan and Michael we had the talks!
(SK) RSS Feed a stránka z udalosťami sú od teraz generované z jedného YAML súboru takže texty budú totožné. Môže sa však stať, že tvojmu feed readeru sa nebude "páčiť" že staré položky sa zmenia.

(EN) RSS Feed and page with events are now generated from the same YAML file so the text will be identical. It can happend that your feed reader wouldn't "like" that the old feed items suddenly changed.

ba:event.ba:title: Who are we, what are we? - Hungarian Perl, from Prague, speak English :-)
ba:event.ba:subject: news
ba:event.ba:creator: jozef

ba:description.p: Google zaradil Slovenčinu do jazykov z ktorých sa dá automaticky prekladať. Tak som hneď skúsil ako je na tom http://ba.pm.org/ ...
screen shot z http://translate.google.com/translate?u=http%3A%2F%2Fba.pm.org%2F&hl=en&ie=UTF-8&sl=sk&tl=en:
We are especially programmers. The Hungarian Perl, IT, network, but mainly the desire to learn more. It connects us to that we have from Prague, or at least to speak English.
:D

(SK) Deadline na zasielanie návrhov na prezentácie pre Twin City Perl Workshop 2008 sa blíži rýchlo! Zostalo už len trochu viac ako jeden týždeň. Na zaslanie svojho návrhu prezentácie sa prosím prihláste prostredníctvom stránky workshopu.

(EN) Call for Papers Deadline on Tue, 7th Oct The deadline for submitting talks for the Twin City Perl Workshop 2008 is approaching fast! There's a little bit more than one week left to submit your proposals. To submit your talk, please use the workshop website.

ba:event.ba:title: The Myths of Innovation - recenzia na knihu
ba:event.ba:subject: book review
ba:event.ba:creator: jozef

ba:description.p:
(SK) Kniha sa veľmi ľahko číta. Je plná nápadov a myšlienok. Snaží sa povzbudiť k tomu aby sa čitatelia nadchli pre zmenu a nové veci. Na jednej strane je to bezpochyby jediný spôsob ako dosiahnuť raketový vzostup firemných akcií. Na druhú stranu určitá dávka zdržanlivosti nie je na škodu. Asi najviac by som ju doporučil ľuďom čo sú vo vedúcich postaveniach aby vedeli čo ich čaká a aby nepremeškali/nezahodili príležitosti pre svoju firmu a tým pádom pre seba.
Tu sa nachádza kompletná recenzia.

(EN) The book is easy to read. It's full of new thoughts and ideas, trying to cheer up the reader to do the change and go for the new things. For sure it's the only way how to make rocket raise of the company shares. On the other hand to be a little conservative never hurts. I will recommend it to the people in charge of making decisions, so that they will not miss/waste the opportunities for their companies and there by for them.
Here is the complete review.
(SK) program pre Twin City Perl Workshop je zverejnený:

Piatok - http://ba.pm.org/go/workshop/day1
Sobota - http://ba.pm.org/go/workshop/day2
(EN) the schedule for the Twin City Perl Workshop is made public now:

Friday - http://ba.pm.org/go/workshop/day1
Saturday - http://ba.pm.org/go/workshop/day2
(SK) vďaka Emmanuel-ovi sú momentálne news feed a stránka s udalosťami generované z jedného zdrojového XML súboru za pomoci XSLT ( events-to-html.xslt + events-to-rdf.xslt ).
(EN) thanks to Emmanuel now the news feed and the page with the events are generated from one source XML file with a help of XSLT( events-to-html.xslt + events-to-rdf.xslt ).
(SK) v utorok 28. Októbra o 18:00 sa stretneme v priestoroch firmy Ergon (Podjavorinskej 6/B 811 03 Bratislava) na prediskutovanie/nacvičenie prezentácií čo zaznejú na TCPW.
(EN) on Tuesday 28th October at 18:00 there will be a Bratislava PM meeting in the office of company Ergon (Podjavorinskej 6/B 811 03 Bratislava) to discuss and train the talks that will be at TCPW.

(SK) TwinCity Perl Workshop 2008 je za nami. Dva dni, 27 prezentácií z toho 5 po slovensky, 6 po nemecky a zvyšok po anglicky. Väčšina z nich je prístupná online. Za Bratislava Perl Mongerov by sme sa chceli poďakovať všetkým prezentujúcim a účastníkom vďaka ktorým sa mohol tento workshop uskutočniť. Do Viedne ich prišlo 32 a do Bratislavy 40. 27 z nich sa zúčastnilo obydvoch dní.

(EN) TwinCity Perl Workshop 2008 is over. Two days, 27 presentations from which were 5 in Slovak, 6 in German and the rest in english. Most of them is available online. Bratislava Perl Mongers would like to sa thak you to all that were presenting and all the attendies. There were 32 attendies in Vienna and 40 in Bratislava. 27 attendies were there both days.
(SK) stretnutie sa uskutoční 15. Decembra o 18:00 vo firme Comsultia (WebCom) na ulici Tomášikova 26. Zatiaľ je v pláne táto prezentácia:
(EN) meeting will happend on 15th December at 18:00 in company Comsultia (WebCom) street Tomášikova 26. There will this presentation:
(SK) Jonathan má schválený grant od The Perl Foundation na "Rakudo Dispatch and Role Enhancements". Gratulujeme!
(EN) Jonathan received a grant from The Perl Foundation to do "Rakudo Dispatch and Role Enhancements". Congratulations!
(SK) bola vytvorená Bratislava Perl Mongers group @ Facebook.
(EN) Bratislava Perl Mongers group was created @ Facebook.
(SK) O projektoch ktoré vytvorili, alebo na ktorých pracujú Bratislava Perl Mongeri sa dá viac dočítať tu.
(EN) Now it's possible to read about projects made by or contributed by Bratislava Perl Mongers here.
(SK) Kto sú Bratislava Perl Mongers
(EN) Discover the Bratislava Perl Mongers

(SK) sa uskutočilo tech-social stretnutie s týmito prezentáciami:
Jonathan - ‎There's More Than One Way To Dispatch It‎ (~20min)
Emmanuel - Xacobeo (~20min)

(EN) a tech-social meeting took place with this presentations:
Jonathan - ‎There's More Than One Way To Dispatch It‎ (~20min)
Emmanuel - Xacobeo (~20min)

(SK) V skratke - http://search.cpan.org/perldoc?SVGraph.
Na http://svn.comsultia.com/svgraph/ nájdete pôvodnú verziu a na CPAN-e si môžete stiahnuť .tar.gz. .pm súbory (okrem komentárov) neboli zmenené. Pribudli Build.PL, Changes, MANIFEST, MANIFEST.SKIP, t/ a examples/ na vytvorenie CPAN balíčka.
Výsledné grafy z príkladov sa dajú pozrieť tu:
http://cpansearch.perl.org/src/COMSULTIA/SVGraph-0.02/doc/src/images/graph.svg, http://cpansearch.perl.org/src/COMSULTIA/SVGraph-0.02/doc/src/images/graph2.svg.

(EN) Shortly - http://search.cpan.org/perldoc?SVGraph.
In http://svn.comsultia.com/svgraph/ you can find the original version and on CPAN you can download .tar.gz. .pm files (besides comments) were not changed. Build.PL, Changes, MANIFEST, MANIFEST.SKIP, t/ and examples/ were added to create a package.
Here you can see the two example graphs:
http://cpansearch.perl.org/src/COMSULTIA/SVGraph-0.02/doc/src/images/graph.svg, http://cpansearch.perl.org/src/COMSULTIA/SVGraph-0.02/doc/src/images/graph2.svg.
(SK) Program stretnutia bol nasledový:

Pizza tentoraz prišla na čas a nezostali sme hladný! Emmanuel predviedol projekt libchamplain a jeho Perl C-bindings pomocou ktorých sa dá do GTK+ aplikácie zakomponovať mapa. Jozef ukázal ako pomocou XML::LibXML::Reader +XML::Compile::Schema spracoval 11MB xml súbor.
(EN) This was a program of the meeting:

This time pizza arrived on time and we were not hungry! Emmanuel showed us project libchamplain and his Perl C-bindings that could be used to have maps in the GTK+ application. Jozef showed how he using XML::LibXML::Reader +XML::Compile::Schema parsed a 11MB xml file.
(SK) Ba.pm má planétu!
(EN) Ba.pm has a planet!

(SK) Tentoraz bez prezentácií ale zato bolo viac času na dobré pivo! Toto stretnutie bolo aj posledné ktoré Emmanuel pravidelne navštívil kedže od budúceho mesiaca bude na druhom konci Európy. V mene Ba.pm mu chcem poďakovať za všetky strasti čo podstúpil s našincami aby ich naučil programovať v Perl-e a za všetky vedomosti čo priniesol a odovzdal u nás v Bratislave po tom čo sem prišiel spoza veľkej mláky. Bude nám chýbať! Prajeme mu veľa úspechov na nasledujúcej životnej púti.

(EN) Without presentations but at least there was a lot of time for a good beer! This meeting was the last one that Emmanuel regulary attended. For the next months (years?) he will be on the other side of the Europe. In the name of Ba.pm I would like to say: Thank you Emmanuel for all you knowledge that you brought and left here. We will miss you! We wish you all the best for your upcomming life journey.
(SK) Desiate vidanie európskej "Yet Another Perl Conference" sa uskutočí v Lisabone - Portugalsku na "Faculty of Sciences, University of Lisbon" a to od 3. do 5. augusta.
(EN) The Tenth Edition of the european Yet Another Perl Conference will be held in Lisbon, Portugal, in the Faculty of Sciences, University of Lisbon, from 3 to 5 August.
(SK) toto je posledná dvojjazyčná správa, od teraz len po Slovensky ;-)
(EN) This is the last dual-language message. from now on there will be two feeds. One in Slovak (this one) and on in English.
Welcome to English feed!
sa stretneme "U Justína". Viac info v mailing liste alebo online na IRC.
we meet in "U Justína" pub. More information in mailing list or online on IRC.
Dnes bolo oficálne vyhlásené, že YAPC::EU::2010 sa bude konať v meste Pisa v Taliansku.
Today the location for the next YAPC::EU was announced: YAPC::EU::2010 will be held in Pisa, Italy.
Dnes odznela Jonathanova prezentácia s názvom Perl 6 Roles In Depth‎ na YAPC::EU::2009.
Today Jonathan gave a talk named Perl 6 Roles In Depth‎ at YAPC::EU::2009.
Dnes odznel Emmanuelov lightning talk s názvom Champlain - OpenStreetMaps widget na YAPC::EU::2009.
Today Emmanuel gave a lightning talk named Champlain - OpenStreetMaps widget at YAPC::EU::2009.
Dnes odznela Jozefova prezentácia s názvom Static can be more na YAPC::EU::2009.
Today Jozef gave a talk named Static can be more at YAPC::EU::2009.

Tentoraz sme mali špeciálneho hosťa - Andrew Shitow, ktorý mal prezentáciu "Perl 6 compiler". Druhá prezentácia bola od Emmanuela s názvom "Pexeso". Skončili sme (asi už pomaly tradične) v Bastione, kde sme si užili dobré pivo, dobré jedlo a free WiFi.

This time we have had a special guest - Andrew Shitow who made a talk called "Perl 6 compiler". The second talk was done by Emmanuel called "Pexeso". After the meeting we went to Bastion where we appreciated a good beer, good food and a free WiFi.
Boli tieto tri prezentácie:

ul.li: Jonathan - Meta-models: the magic that makes OO less magical

ba:description.p: We have had this three presentations:

ul.li: Jonathan - Meta-models: the magic that makes OO less magical
